name: sliced in sauce
title: Gourmet Perle · sliced in sauce · turkey, tuna, duck, agneau
description: Gourmet sliced in sauce turkey, tuna, duck, agneau I just can't resist this gentle temptation

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Meat and animal derivatives (16% of which lamb 4%), Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives, minerals, Various sugars. Composition: Meat and animal derivatives, Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives (tuna 4%), minerals, Various sugars. Composition: Meat and animal derivatives (14% of which duck 4%), Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives, minerals, Various sugars. Composition: Meat and animal derivatives (14% of which turkey 4%), Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives, minerals, Various sugars.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/kg: Vit A: 700; Vit D3: 105; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 8.0); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 0.20); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 0.7); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 1.5); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 14.5); taurine: 440. Flavourings.

usageInformation.usage: Your cat is a true gourmet, but sometimes it is difficult to find exactly her taste? For this reason GOURMET has created Perle - Exquisite Stripes. The delicate varieties will appeal to your cat's senses in an irresistible way every day. Selected strips of fish or meat were cooked in a tasty sauce to pamper the palate of small velvet paws. GOURMET Pearl Selected strips - every day a tasteful temptation for a unique taste experience.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Contains 4 recipes: Turkey - Tuna - Duck - Agneau

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: Fresh clean drinking water should be always available.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Füttern Sie Ihrer ausgewachsenen Katze (4kg) 3 bis 4 Portionsbeutel pro Tag,  die auf mindestens 2 Mahlzeiten verteilt werden sollten. Diese Richtwerte basieren auf mässig aktiven Katzen bei normaler Umgebungstemperatur. Individuelle Bedürfnisse können variieren,  sodass die Futtermenge entsprechend angepasst werden sollte,  um ein schlankes,  gesundes Körpergewicht Ihrer Katze zu erhalten. Bitte zimmerwarm servieren. Sauberes,  frisches Wasser sollte stets zur Verfügung stehen.

mainSpecificities.code: Food needs per day in bowls
